metadata.synopsis: Mrs. Alywood (Anjelica Huston) is a distraught mother whose daughter, Karen, vanished in the English countryside over 20 years ago. When Jan Carstairs (Tallulah Evans) and her family move into the idyllic Alywood manor for the summer, Mrs. Alywood is taken aback by Jan's striking resemblance to Karen. Strange occurrences begin to unnerve the family, and Jan begins to suspect that they are linked to Karen's disappearance.

reviews: It's a pretty bland movie but it does have good performances and some scary sequences.
So-so remake of '80s thriller has mild scares.
So is this two-hour movie scary? Only for anyone who appreciates continuity, logical character development, and decent dialogue.
